Tools.title: The tools I use every day
Tools.description: As a developer, I'm constantly on the lookout for tools and resources that can simplify my work, improve my productivity and stimulate my creativity. However, my quest for efficiency is not limited to the field of development; I also like to discover tools that can facilitate other aspects of my daily life.
Tools.description-2: Here I present these tools and resources and how I use them. I hope it will inspire some of you.
